form.question: Your Question
form.questionDescription: Framing a clear intention helps channel more focused insights.
form.spreadDescription: Select how many cards to draw for your reading

instructions.focus: Take a deep breath and focus on your question
instructions.shuffle: Click to shuffle when you feel ready
instructions.draw: The cards will be drawn when the energy feels aligned

single.name: Single Card
single.description: A quick insight for daily guidance or a focused question

threeCard.name: Three Card Spread
threeCard.description: Past, Present, and Future - a classic spread for understanding your journey

celticCross.name: Celtic Cross

Readings.title: My Readings
Readings.subtitle: Your journey through the stars and cards

empty.title: No Readings Yet
empty.description: Start your journey by getting an astrology or tarot reading.

deleteConfirm.title: Delete Reading?
deleteConfirm.message: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete this reading?

placidus.name: Placidus
placidus.description: The most widely used system, based on time divisions

koch.name: Koch
koch.description: Popular in German-speaking countries, time-based calculation

wholeSign.name: Whole Sign
wholeSign.description: The oldest system, each sign occupies one whole house

equal.name: Equal House
equal.description: Each house spans exactly 30 degrees from the Ascendant

campanus.name: Campanus
campanus.description: Space-based system dividing the prime vertical

regiomontanus.name: Regiomontanus
regiomontanus.description: Space-based system using the celestial equator

Chat.title: Ask the Cosmos
Chat.subtitle: Continue your exploration with AI guidance
Chat.askQuestions: Ask follow-up questions about your reading

suggestions.title: Suggested Questions
astrology: What does my Sun-Moon combination reveal about my personality?
How do my challenging aspects influence my life path?
What career paths align with my chart?
tarot: Can you elaborate on the main card's meaning for my situation?
What action should I take based on this reading?
How do these cards relate to each other?

Errors.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
